Direzione o partecipazione a comitati ed.content: Editor (Statistics), Journal of Child Health Care (Sage Publications)
Editorial Board Member, Significance (Wiley-Blackwell on behalf of the Royal Statistical Society and the American Statistical Association)

Organizzazione o partecipazione come rel.content: Conference Speaker. Title: Use of auxiliary data in semiparametric regression with nonignorable missing responses, 33rd Annual Meeting of the Statistical Society of Canada, Saskatoon, Canada. June 12-15, 2005.

Conference Speaker. Title: Cancer cluster detection in semi-parametric models with random effects: A score-based testing approach, 2006 Spring Meeting of the Eastern North American Region of the International Biometric Society, Tampa, USA. March 26-29, 2006.

Conference Speaker. Title: Analysis of cancer survival by region in teenagers and young adults in England. RSS 2008, The International Conference of the Royal Statistical Society, Nottingham, UK. September 1-5, 2008.

Conference Speaker. Title: Evaluation of reduced rank semiparametric models to assess excess of risk in cluster analysis, Applied Statistics 2008 International Conference, Ribno, Slovenia. September 21-24, 2008.
Conference Speaker. Title: Linear mixed quantile regression models: Extensions and developments. Institute of Mathematical Statistics Annual Meeting, Gothenburg, Sweden. August 9-13, 2010.
Session Chair for the 42nd Congress of the International Society of Paediatric Oncology, Boston MA, USA. October 21-24, 2010.
